companyName: C-Tracks ETN on Miller/Howard Fundamental MLP Index Series B Due July 13 2026
description: The C-Tracks are designed for investors who seek exposure to the performance of the Miller/Howard MLP Fundamental Index and any distributions that may be paid on the securities included in the Index, reduced by an accrued investor fee. The Index is designed to measure the performance of 25 energy master limited partnerships (¿MLPs¿) selected quarterly by a methodology that is based upon certain quantitative fundamental factors of publicly traded MLPs, including distribution growth, estimated capital expenditures and distribution coverage.
